text: Ara smarana kara, yakhana allaha tomaderake pratisruti dena ye, du dalera [1] ekadala tomadera ayattadhina habe; athaca tomara cacchile ye, nirastra dalati tomadera ayattadhina hoka [2]. Ara allahâ€Œ cacchilena ye, tini satyake tamra bani dbara pratisthita karena ebam kapheraderake nirmula karena
